channel.title: Articles on Abhisek Ganguly
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Abhisek Ganguly

item.title: Pilot
item.description: Hello reader, Welcome to my personal website. Here I journal my developer journay and also showcase my projects for all to see. I’m so excited so share my learning journey with people online, but first let me introduce myself to those who don’t know me. My name is Abhisek Ganguly and I’m an engineering student at VIT Bhopal University with major in Computer Science. My specialization in computataional and data science.

item.title: Project III: Coming soon
item.description: I’m working on something new and exciting. It’ll be served to you ready and hot.

item.title: Project II: Dog breed classification
item.description: A dog breed classification system built using Keras Deep learning. It is built on dataset from Kaggle which you can find here This classification system is built using convolutional neural networks (CNN) that allows us to train and test the model on a wide variety of data with high precession. Screenshot of the project Screenshot of the project You can find this project hosted on clouds here Link to this project’s GitHub Repository.

item.title: Project I: Pancard Fraud Detection System.
item.description: A PAN card fraud detection system. It works by differentiating between original and fake PAN cards by comparing theie structural similarity. The original GitHub repository of this project can be found here The web app is developed using flask, a python web framework. Screenshot of the project Link to this project’s GitHub Repository.
